column6:
An intense tale of a struggle for survival as a terrified, mute, and badly injured Siryn finds herself at the mercy of a demented captor...and her only hope of rescue is in the person of a powerless Rictor!,2006,3
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Dennis Calero | writer:Peter David | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Ryan Sook | colorist:Jose Villarrubia
